universal_script.loader:
local API = _G.SnowHubAPI
local Tab = API.AddTab('Main', 'home')
Tab.AddButton('Log Session Key', function() print('Key: ' .. _G.script_key) end)
Tab.AddToggle('In-Game Snow', true, function(s) _G.isSnowing = s end)

blox_fruits.loader:
local API = _G.SnowHubAPI
local Combat = API.AddTab('Combat', 'sword')
Combat.AddToggle('Auto Farm', false, function(s) print('Farming: ' .. tostring(s)) end)
Combat.AddButton('Collect Chests', function() print('Collecting...') end)
local Teleport = API.AddTab('Teleport', 'map-pin')
Teleport.AddButton('Sea 1', function() print('TP Sea 1') end)
Teleport.AddButton('Sea 2', function() print('TP Sea 2') end)

blade_ball.loader:
local API = _G.SnowHubAPI
local Main = API.AddTab('Auto', 'zap')
Main.AddToggle('Auto Parry', false, function(s) print('Parry: ' .. tostring(s)) end)
Main.AddToggle('Spam Parry', false, function(s) print('Spam: ' .. tostring(s)) end)
local Visuals = API.AddTab('Visuals', 'eye')
Visuals.AddToggle('Ball ESP', false, function(s) print('ESP: ' .. tostring(s)) end)

ps99.loader:

local Farm = API.AddTab('Farm', 'coins')
Farm.AddToggle('Auto Collect', false, function(s) print('Collecting: ' .. tostring(s)) end)
Farm.AddToggle('Auto Hatch', false, function(s) print('Hatching: ' .. tostring(s)) end)

doors.loader:
local API = _G.SnowHubAPI
local Exploit = API.AddTab('Exploit', 'ghost')
Exploit.AddButton('Reach Next Door', function() print('Moving...') end)
Exploit.AddToggle('Light Boost', false, function(s) print('Light: ' .. tostring(s)) end)
